'''A_SetChaseThreshold''' (int ''threshold'' [, bool def [, int ''ptr'']])
== Usage == Changes the calling actor ([[Actor Pointers|pointer]])'s [[Actor_properties#Threshold|Threshold]] or [[Actor_properties#DefThreshold|DefThreshold]] to ''threshold'', depending on if ''def'' is true or not.
== Parameters == * ''threshold'': The actor's new threshold. * ''def'': If true, sets the default threshold instead. * ''ptr'': The [[Actor Pointers|pointer]] to set it upon.
==Example== {{noexamples}}
{{DEFAULTSORT:SetPainThreshold}}[[category:Decorate Status change functions]]
